title: OpenSSL dodges a security bullet
description: The critical security vulnerability turned out to be two serious vulnerabilities. Still, they need patching ASAP.

description: Setting up a bedtime schedule for your Android phone can have some surprising benefits, such as gaining insight into your sleep.

description: It's no bigger than a key fob but it solves two common problems in one small package.

description: Here's how to trim down the number of notifications you get on your Android, so you can keep calm and carry on.

title: The Nova Air 2 Plus is an e-ink Android tablet that artists will be drawn to
description: The Onyx Boox Nova Air 2 Plus is a stellar pick if you want e-ink functionality over Android for your artistic endeavors. There are several quirks that you should be aware of, though.

title: Save $50 on the SteelSeries Apex 7 keyboard
description: During Adorama's 14 Days of Deals, you can find great deals on gaming equipment. Right now, the SteelSeries Apex 7 Mechanical Gaming Keyboard is on sale for 31% off.

title: Problem scaling AI? MIT proposes sub-photon optical deep learning at the edge
description: Using wavelength division multiplexing, researchers were able to perform image recognition using optical computing, thereby dramatically lowering the energy required.

title: State of Marketing Research: Real-time intelligence and hyper-personalization are a competitive advantage
description: The State of Marketing 2022 research based on a survey of 6,000 marketing leaders worldwide highlights how marketers are evolving in the face of uncertainty, preparing for retirement of third-party cookies, enhancing the customer experience, and innovating to meet changing customer needs.

title: How Samsung sees the future of your home

description: As it becomes ready to fully support Matter, here's how Samsung's SmartThings brand sees the future of your home.

title: Elon Musk might resurrect Vine from the social media graveyard
description: Under Musk's new management, it seems possible that Twitter will become a short-form video sharing app like Vine or TikTok.

title: I cut my video streaming bill in half, and so can you

title: Ransomware: Not enough victims are reporting attacks, and that's a problem for everyone

description: US government looks at ways of limiting the impact of ransomware across the world.

title: Space X's Falcon Heavy giant rocket launches for first time since 2019
description: World's biggest operational rocket takes off to deliver satellites into geosynchronous orbit.

title: Acer Swift Edge laptop review: The lightest 4K OLED laptop yet

title: QuietOn's new sleep earbuds will comfortably block out your neighbor's holiday parties

title: Honor Pad 8 review: An affordable and capable 12-inch Android tablet

title: Singapore explores programmable digital currency use cases with industry trials
description: Central bank says it is testing various uses of "purpose-bound" digital money with industry players, including funds disbursement without requiring recipients to have a bank account.
